alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 13 at 12:19AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 230 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low-lying and flood-prone locations in Indian Bend Wash is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Local media have reported water rescues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1218 AM MST, gauge reports and broadcast media continue to show significant flow through Indian Bend Wash due to earlier thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Salt River and Indian Bend Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Phoenix, Scottsdale, Tempe, Paradise Valley, and Downtown Scottsdale. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
